Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: Currently, our customers are only interested in Investments that offer cost-cutting possibilities white providing visible increases in efficiency and expect a quick return on their Investment. In 2002, varetis has set the course strategically for the company's medium-term development. ADIS enables telephone companies to offer reliable directory inquiry services with low personnel volumes and costs. Current market penetration by varetis provides a good basis for continued sales from system Upgrades. The Company's market share in the traditional markets of Western Europe remains high at 42%. Our existing customers in these markets are very interested in automation and in a reduction of costs because of high personnel expenses. In addition, we have also already achieved market shares of 12% and 10% respectively in the growth markets of Eastern Europe and Asia with a sound customer base. In these regions, the current aim is to provide a reliable technological basis for telephone directory inquiry services. The worldwide market potential for telephone directory inquiries is currently estimated at 13.5 billion calls or US-$ 8 billion. The aforementioned figures are based on our own extensive research and surveys. The market is currently undergoing an increasing change from just being Directory Inquiries to a Call Center with additional services such as information about SMS and the Internet, Automated Directory Inquiry System (ADIS) and value-added services (e.g. Location Based Services).
